dict.string: Jarvis needs microphone access for voice conversations and commands.
Jarvis uses on-device speech recognition to understand your voice commands.
Jarvis needs accessibility access to control UI elements, click buttons, and automate tasks across applications.
Jarvis needs to send Apple Events to control applications and automate macOS tasks.
Jarvis needs screen capture access to take screenshots and understand visual context.
Jarvis needs input monitoring access to simulate keyboard and mouse input for automation.
Jarvis uses Siri integration to respond to voice commands via Shortcuts.
